channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Morning Minute: The Day I Became Radicalized
Sen. Ron Johnson to Newsmax: Debate Over Healthcare Subsidies Deliberately Distorted
item.description: The debate over extending healthcare subsidies is being deliberately mischaracterized to pressure Congress, Sen. Ron Johnson told Newsmax on Wednesday...

item.title: House Republican who voted to impeach Trump in 2021 won't seek re-election
item.description: Rep. Dan Newhouse, R-Wash., will not seek re-election in 2026, he announced Wednesday, thanking both his constituents and colleagues.

item.title: Rep. Knott to Newsmax: Brown University Shooting Probe 'Unacceptable'

item.title: New Media Angle: Sydney Attacks, Inspired by ISIS and Targeting Jews, Had ‘Nothing to Do With Religion’

item.title: Maryland to study slavery reparations after lawmakers override Dem governor's veto
item.description: Maryland legislature overrides Gov. Wes Moore's veto to create reparations commission studying slavery's legacy and racial discrimination impacts.

item.title: THE ESSEX FILES: AOC's Puerto Rico Trip Highlights the Hollow Core of Performative Socialism

item.title: Siena Poll: Hochul Up 19 Points Over Stefanik in N.Y. Governor's Race
item.description: A new Siena College poll shows New York Gov. Kathy Hochul holding a commanding lead over her potential Republican challengers as the state looks ahead...
